content.question: <math alttext="the integral from, 0 to 1, of, the fraction with numerator 2 times x cubed, minus x squared, plus 2 x, plus 2, and denominator x squared, plus 1, end fraction, d x, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo stretchy="true">∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle><mtext> </mtext><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="3 times the natural log of 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>ln</mi><mn>2</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>
